document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

bibRefCitation.author: Gyllenhal, L.
bibRefCitation.refString: Gyllenhal, L. (1834) [new taxa]. In: Schoenherr, C. J., Genera et species Curculionidum, cum synonymia hujusfamiliae. Species novae aut hactenus minus cognitae, descriptionibus a Dom. Leonardo Gyilenhal, C. H. Boheman, et entomologis aliis illustratae. Tomus secundus. - Pars prima. Roret, Parisii and Fred. Fleischer, Lipsia, 326 pp. https: // doi. org / 10.5962 / bhl. title. 8952

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. SE Europe, West Asia, East Palaearctic (excluding north) ( Meregalli & Fremuth 2013 ; Legalov 2010).

Material examined.
79 specimens ( ZIN , SIZK , KUMN , ZMUK , NSPU , IMC , SSC , YKC ) from 11 provinces were studied.

:
3 spec. ( SIZK ) Zvenyhorodka Distr. , Murzyntsi
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Chyhyryn Distr. , V . Luchnik leg.
;
2 spec. ( ZMUM ) Kaniv A. Kryshtal leg.,
5.vi.1948
;

: 1 spec. ( KUMN ) Pershotravneve Distr. , Bilosarayska Spit , in pitfall trap , Martynov leg.,
18.vi.1999
;

11.v.1982

;

.
Biology. Marine coasts, sands, saltmarshes. Adults occur in III–IX. Oligophagous on Chenopodioideae ( Amaranthaceae ).

Note . Finding of
A. vexata in Podolia Upland ( Mazur 2002 )
marks its western range limit.
